name: portfolio-monorepo
description: Portfolio website with Nuxt frontend and Strapi backend

scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && nvm use 23 && npm run dev
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && nvm use 22 && npm run develop
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && nvm use 23 && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && nvm use 22 && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && nvm use 23 && npm run start
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && nvm use 22 && npm run start
